May 2025:Jio Blackrock Asset Management Private Limited received approval to start operations.

May 23, 2025:Jio Financial Services announced SEBI's grant of a Certificate of Registration to Jio Blackrock Mutual Fund and provided prior intimation of an Analyst Meet at Citi's 2025 Macro & Pan-Asia Investor Conference.

May 27, 2025:An update on the Institutional Investors' Meeting at Citi's 2025 Macro & Pan-Asia Investor Conference was provided.

April 17, 2025:Jio Financial Services announced audited financial results for the financial year ended March 31, 2025, including a dividend update and Q4 results.

April 18, 2025:Prior intimation of an Analyst Meet at Bank of America's 2025 India Conference was given.

April 8, 2025:The outcome of a Board Meeting was announced.

April 3, 2025:Jio Finance Limited, a subsidiary, announced its entry into Digital Loan Against Securities.

March 2025:Jio Financial Services launched its New Fund Offering.
